subject: Paris Attacks (November 2015)
Soccer
Terrorism
lead_paragraph: Coaches for France and Germany decided not to tell their players of the carnage, and most fans in the Stade de France just north of Paris had no cellphone reception.
snippet: Coaches for France and Germany decided not to tell their players of the carnage, and most fans in the Stade de France just north of Paris had no cellphone reception.
